Html:
hello, everyone
I am using GMap.net and seen that it's professional.
I used it online very good...
But I don't know how to cache maps for using offline and how to make operations on that offline maps.
pls support me. thank you very much.

if you see the map, it's already in cache or is being cached, it's done automatically
  • you can use demos to prefetch selected area

i already have searched in online discussion. But i don't see what subject is about this problem.
pls recommend me links about it.
thank you very much.

radioman wrote:
if you see the map, it's already in cache or is being cached, it's done automatically

hello, radioman
what is demo? and how to use demos to prefetch selected area in GMap.net
thank you.
